DOC.brief_summary: Comparative study determine whether several fertility monitoring product - DuoFertility monitor , LadyComp/Babycomp monitor Clearblue Ovulation test - substantially equivalent performance , secondarily determine appropriateness label information DuoFertility monitor .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan recruit 30 woman currently try conceive , ask use 3 fertility monitor duration 3 menstrual cycle . Additionally , study woman ask fill online questionnaire assess usability monitor . As spouse often critical partner purchase decision compliance , investigator also ask spouse complete similar online questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Participant willing able give inform consent participation Females age 18 44 year Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 29 Regular menstrual cycle , i.e . great 7 day difference short long cycle last 6 month Minimum menstrual cycle 24 day Maximum menstrual cycle 33 day Female participant willing use 3 fertility monitor least 3 cycle . Willing fill regular questionnaire study diary Women age young 18 year , old 44 year Have BMI less 18 great 29 Any diagnose systemic illness , include restrict thyroid disease , diabetes inflammatory disease Polycystic ovary disease Endometriosis pelvic pathology ( include prove tubal disease ) Taking steroid , include oral contraceptive anti inflammatory drug
